mapper.select: SELECT mt.monthly_transaction_id, mt.monthly_transaction_name, mt.monthly_transaction_amount, mt.monthly_transaction_date, c.category_name, sc.sub_category_name FROM monthly_transaction mt INNER JOIN category c ON c.category_id = mt.category_id INNER JOIN sub_category sc ON sc.sub_category_id = mt.sub_category_id WHERE mt.user_no = #{userNo};
